paper_keywords: Complementarity and equilibrium problems and variational inequalities (Finite dimensions)
paper_abstract: This paper addresses a problem that is typical of multi-period capacity expansion equilibrium models: plants or sectors have different risk exposures that may warrant different costs of capital. The paper examines modifications of a capacity expansion model interpreted in equilibrium terms to account for asset-specific costs of capital.
paper_title: Risk adjusted discounted cash flows in capacity expansion models
